thread.section_title: FabKids Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FabKids | fabkids.com
thread.title: Hannah

author: Hannah
title: Hannah
text: So a month or so ago i ordered from FabKidz and i never got my order and i complained on a review. Obviously being hot headed about it at the time i didn't think to ask calmly to someone about what had happened. But in the end i was personally messaged and turned out it was a shipping error but the manager had taken care of me and fixed my order and got it shipped and delivered within a week. I really appriciate how professionally she handled the situation and how fast she solved the problem. I loved the shoes, very cute and so did my daughters! I will defiantly order here again soon, and recommend to friends, family and anyone.
